data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Jose Luis Morales puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Levante in the half of Valencia.
Levante are coming forward and Jose Campana gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Valencia at Mestalla.
Ball safe as Levante is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valencia have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 11, In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Gabriel Paulista scores with his head for Valencia to level the match at 1-1.
In the minute 12, Kang In Lee instrumental with a fine assist.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Levante to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Valencia.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Eliaquim Mangala for Valencia who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
In the minute 17, It seems as if Eliaquim Mangala is unable to continue. Mouctar Diakhaby replaces him for the home team.
Valencia advance rapidly upfield but Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez blows for offside.
In the minute 23, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Valencia.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Levante in their own half.
Free kick Levante.
In Valencia Levante attack through Sergio Leon. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 29, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Goncalo Guedes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Valencia.
Can Levante capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
In the minute 32, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Levante throw-in in Valencia's half.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
In the minute 35, Levante have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Goal! Jose Luis Morales gives Levante a 1-2 lead in Valencia.
In the minute 36, Great play from Jorge Miramon to set up the goal.
Valencia have a goal kick.
Goal! Valencia go level at 2-2 through Maxi Gomez in Valencia.
In the minute 39, That's a fine assist from Kang In Lee.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Levante throw-in in Valencia's half.
Levante to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
In the minute 42, In Valencia, Valencia push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Valencia push upfield but Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez quickly pulls them for offside.
Maxi Gomez of Valencia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
Corner awarded to Levante.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Mestalla.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Free kick for Levante in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 47, Enis Bardhi for Levante gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
Levante's Jose Luis Morales breaks free at Mestalla. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Levante's Nemanja Radoja gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Levante.
Valencia are pushing forward but Vicente Esquerdo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 51, Goal kick for Levante at Mestalla.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Valencia in the half of Levante.
In the minute 52, Nemanja Radoja is booked for the away team.
Valencia's Yunus Musah misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
In the minute 55, Valencia's Maxi Gomez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Levante defender.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Levante's half?
Valencia needs to be cautious. Levante have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 57, Levante pushes forward through Jose Campana, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Levante at Mestalla.
Sergio Leon of Levante gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 59, Valencia have a goal kick.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Paco Lopez is making the team's first substitution at Mestalla with Dani Gomez replacing Sergio Leon.
In the minute 62, Levante push forward at Mestalla and Jose Campana gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Valencia defence.
In Valencia Levante drive forward through Enis Bardhi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
At Mestalla, Rober Pier has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Levante awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
In the minute 65, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Levante are coming forward and Jorge Miramon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Corner awarded to Levante.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Valencia a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Valencia drive upfield and Kang In Lee gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Levante defender.
Throw-in for Levante in the half of Valencia.
Denis Cheryshev is replacing Goncalo Guedes for Valencia at Mestalla.
At Mestalla, Levante are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 72, Manu Vallejo for Valencia drives towards goal at Mestalla. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Manu Vallejo is replacing Kang In Lee for the home team.
Javi Gracia (Valencia) is making a fourth substitution, with Uros Racic replacing Vicente Esquerdo.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Levante.
In the minute 75, Levante to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Valencia take a 3-2 lead thanks to Manu Vallejo.
Denis Cheryshev with an assist there.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Enis Bardhi with Jorge De Frutos Sebastian. This is the third substitution made today by Paco Lopez.
The away team replace Gonzalo Melero with Nikola Vukcevic.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Levante.
Throw-in for Valencia close to the penalty box.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
In the minute 81, Valencia's Uros Racic breaks free at Mestalla. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Valencia have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Levante at Mestalla.
Levante make their fifth substitution with Sergio Postigo replacing Nemanja Radoja.
Yunus Musah is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 85, Coke is on a sub for Oscar Duarte for Levante.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Levante throw-in in Valencia's half.
Valenciaâ€™s Yunus Musah is on his feet again at Mestalla.
In the minute 87, Valencia push upfield but Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez quickly pulls them for offside.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
In the minute 88, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Javi Gracia (Valencia) is making a fifth change, with Ruben Sobrino replacing the possibly injured Yunus Musah.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Uros Racic for Valencia has been booked by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Corner awarded to Levante.
Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Valencia's Geoffrey Kondogbia gets in a shot on goal at Mestalla. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Valencia's Denis Cheryshev misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Valencia throw-in in Levante's half.
Ball safe as Levante is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has come to a close in Valencia. The final score is 4-2.
Jose Campana (Levante) has received a yellow card from Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Goal! Valencia extend their lead to 4-2 through Manu Vallejo.
Coke (Levante) gets a yellow card.
